One of the key aspects of any website is typography, which includes fonts, text styles, and layouts. In this documentation, we will explore how to work with typography in Bootstrap 5.3. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on how to effectively utilize typography features in Bootstrap 5.3. It covers the necessary requirements and pre-requisites, provides code snippets and commands for reference, and offers troubleshooting solutions for common issues. Additionally, it includes best practices and recommendations for optimal usage of typography in Bootstrap. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To work with Bootstrap 5.3 typography, you need to have the following: - Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS - Bootstrap 5.3 installed or included in your project ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1.
